column1: Personal Student Supplies: Write name or initials on all
4 Writing Composition Notebook (non -spiral) Bring 2 to school.
Below are items that do not need to be labeled.
3 Packs of wide ruled notebook paper
2 Packs of Red and Blue pens
2 Boxes of plastic cutlery (spoons, forks, knives)
1 Either 1 box of quart size bags or sandwich bags
1 Pack of Dry erase markers (skinny or thick) and a sock
1 Pack of napkins and/or paper plates
Wish List: Treasure box items, individually wrapped candy, colored
